comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: with war looming, more money was spent on a larger ship, giving her a more refined look than earlier classes. Also the first British class (Orion) to have all Big guns on the center line, and using he new 13.5 inch instead of 12 inch guns. She had an eventful career en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HMS_Monarch_(1911)

comment._content: The follow on class, with fire control forward of the stacks, was Iron Duke- or at least I'm pretty sure it was.
